column1: The eDWIN advisory platform was created as part of the project \""Internet Platform for Advisory and Decision Support in Integrated Plant Protection\"".
The platform is completely free and available to everyone on computers and as an application on mobile devices
column2: but only currently accessible to users in Poland.
